meanings.definition: The action or process of adapting or being adapted.
meanings.sent1: Her adaptation to the new school was quick and smooth.
meanings.sent2: The adaptation of the book into a movie was well-received.
meanings.sent3: The adaptation of the penguin trying to fly was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: His adaptation to the role of a leader was like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The adaptation of the plant to low light conditions was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A change or adjustment to fit a new purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: The adaptation of the recipe for a larger group was successful.
meanings.sent2: His adaptation to the cold weather was evident in his choice of clothing.
meanings.sent3: The adaptation of the cat trying to swim in the bathtub was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her adaptation to the new job was like a puzzle piece fitting perfectly into place.
meanings.sent5: The adaptation of the building to withstand earthquakes was impressive.
